Articles.Content:
I have upgraded my astronaut complex to max. I can plant flags, but no soil sample option. Sorry if its been answered I've been trying to search and soo many articles come up from the old versions.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-16T22:12:03Z" title="05/16/2015 10:12  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 16, 2015</time> by Elfmaze**
You also need to upgrade your Research and Development facility to at least level 2.
